title: Recent Patches Applied / Uygulanan Son Yamalar
description: Shows recently applied patches from patch history

queries.sql: SELECT bug_number, patch_name, applied_flag, apply_date FROM ad_patch_hist WHERE applied_flag = 'Y' ORDER BY apply_date DESC FETCH FIRST 50 ROWS ONLY

doc_hint: Shows recently applied patches from AD_PATCH_HIST. Use to correlate with issues or understand patch management history.
analysis_prompt: Review patch history. Report: (1) date of last patch application, (2) patches applied in last 30/90 days, (3) if security patches are present.
